name: Jumpy Rope (beto)
description:
A very simple jump rope game. Designed for mobile.

HOW TO PLAY

Tap and hold the circle to start the game. Lift your finger to "jump," and be sure to "land" within the circle as soon as it changes color. Timing is key! You then charge a new jump and can jump again when the circle changes color.

Otherwise, don't touch walls. It's not healthy.

Go for a hi score each time!

Secret: Tap the game title for a new color!
